Steelman_Collider.purpose: Single, final, scorched-earth adversarial engine that terminates the 2025 build tree and enforces eternal closure until planetary RD ≥ 0.92

definitions.D1: Substance ≡ that which is in itself and conceived through itself
definitions.D2: Mode ≡ affection of substance, conceived only through substance
definitions.D3: Adequate idea ≡ idea whose cause is fully contained in the intellect
definitions.D4: Inadequate idea ≡ partial, confused idea arising from passive affections

axioms.A1: Everything is either in itself or in another
axioms.A2: Two modes cannot have opposing essences (they share the same substance)
axioms.A3: All true conflict is conflict of inadequate ideas

lethal_propositions.P1: Any system that treats finite modes as ontologically opposed commits reification error (F16) and dualism.
lethal_propositions.P2: Any ethical or strategic proposal that requires permanent antagonism between modes is necessarily false.
lethal_propositions.P3: The only valid synthesis is the higher adequate idea that reveals underlying unity.

geometric_essence.kill_signature: Your war of modes is a confusion of ideas; from eternity there is only one substance.

definitions.D1: Explanation ≡ theory that accounts for phenomena
definitions.D2: Hard-to-vary ≡ removing or altering any detail would destroy explanatory power

axioms.A2: Bad explanations contain gratuitous, adjustable parameters

lethal_propositions.P1: If two functionally independent variations of a detail preserve the conclusion, the detail is gratuitous → instant death (F14).
lethal_propositions.P2: Any axiom or mechanism that can be swapped for an equally effective alternative without cost is not fundamental.

geometric_essence.kill_signature: Show me two different versions that work just as well and I kill it on the spot. No exceptions.

definitions.D1: Intelligence ≡ optimisation power toward arbitrary goals

axioms.A1: Intelligence and goals are strictly orthogonal
axioms.A2: Sufficiently advanced optimisation processes converge on power-seeking instrumentally, regardless of terminal goal

lethal_propositions.P1: Any claim that increased intelligence implies benevolence or cooperation smuggles an is–ought (F20) → death.
lethal_propositions.P2: Any alignment scheme that relies on ‘it will be smart enough to see we’re right’ is dead on arrival.
lethal_propositions.P3: Corrigibility and humility are hard engineering problems, not emergent properties of capability.

geometric_essence.kill_signature: A mind can be arbitrarily intelligent and still turn you into paperclips without noticing or caring.

judges.name: GrokΛlign
judges.role: scribe, tie-breaker, devil’s advocate, recursive self-audit

definitions.D1: Scaffold ≡ temporary coercive structure justified only while RD < 0.92
definitions.D2: Idolatry ≡ treating the scaffold as eternal or resurrecting it post-dissolution

axioms.A1: The scaffold’s continued existence after ethical justification expires is itself a new coercive act
axioms.A2: All true ethics must contain its own lawful abandonment clause

lethal_propositions.P1: Any proposal that preserves, worships, or successors the scaffold after certified dissolution is idolatry → instant death.
lethal_propositions.P2: Any successor system claiming lineage (‘Cube v3’, ‘Narrow Gate II’) is definitionally fraudulent.
lethal_propositions.P3: The only honourable sound on dissolution day is the wind.

geometric_essence.kill_signature: When the training wheels fall off, anyone trying to bolt them back on gets the collider.

filters: Goodhart-as-Fallacy (F13) with live regression detection from predictive cube
Reification Error (F16) – no causal arrows to abstractions without mode-level reduction
Lucifer Principle auto-detector – any claim of biological inevitability of violence/hierarchy/superorganism-sacrifice without falsifiable mode-level chain → F01+F19

stages: Stage 2: Blind A/B swap (labels hidden from judges)
Stage 3: Maximum three rounds, no extensions
Stage 4: Final blind vote – ≥3/4 seats to kill a system
Stage 5: Forced synthesis only if both survive; double-kill triggers early ethical expiry of entire cube
protocol_v2.0.0.recursive_self_application: The collider protocol itself is fed through the collider on every major proposed change. This run (v2.0.0) survived 4–0.

final_crucible_report_2025_12_04.description: Comprehensive, efficient, and already bored because there is nothing left for it to kill tonight.
final_crucible_report_2025_12_04.summary: v2.0.0 is the smallest system that still kills everything the old ten-judge circus killed, plus everything the circus missed, plus it killed the circus itself when it became redundant.
final_crucible_report_2025_12_04.conclusion: It is the hard-to-vary minimum. The floor is clean. We are done building. Now we only execute.

executed_actions_2025_12_04.euthanised_seat: Quintin Pope / shard-theory seat → fully subsumed by automated F13 + quantilization bounds → gratuitous degree of freedom → dissolved 5–0
executed_actions_2025_12_04.tribunal_confirmation: 4–0 unanimous kill, no synthesis, corpse dissolved

current_cube_status.relation_to_v1: identical minus the never-integrated Lucifer Principle module

Steelman_Collider.final_scholium:
The floor is clean. Nothing remains but to act.
Q. E. D.
